Beast Herder Tunatun: Please bring me a Jewel of Innocence. This isn't something you can purchase, or kill something for... You must earn it by raising a beast yourself!
Alas, this is an honor that only comes once in a lifetime... I'll never forget my little beast... And the brilliance of that gemstone! If only I could possess one again... Could you please bring a Jewel of Innocence to me? [Quest _020_BringUpWithLove quest_accept|"I'll do it."]
